tool_description: Evaluates proposed contract terms and their financial implications, comparing alternatives and assessing long-term costs.

proposed_terms.description: Array of proposed contract terms for evaluation

evaluation_criteria.description: Criteria for evaluating terms: cost, feasibility, risk, strategic_fit

error_messages: Empty proposed terms: At least one contract term must be provided for evaluation.
Invalid evaluation criteria: Evaluation criteria must include at least one of: cost, feasibility, risk, strategic_fit.
Malformed terms: Contract terms must be properly formatted strings describing specific provisions.
usage: Provide proposed_terms array and evaluation_criteria to assess contract terms. Returns detailed evaluation of each term with scores and recommendations.

term_evaluations.description: Detailed evaluation of each proposed term

cost_implications.description: Cost implications for each evaluated term

overall_recommendation.description: Overall recommendation for the proposed terms
